PHRASE.LANG:
The MorphMask Bundle for Men contains a great selection of MorphMasks™.
 
 This bundle contains:
 (1) MorphMask - Zombie (Men)
 (2) MorphMask - Dracula (Men)
 (3) MorphMask - Pumpkin (Men)
 (4) MorphMask - FrankenMorph (Men)
 (5) MorphMask - Classic Frankenstein (Men)
 (6) MorphMask - Mummy (Men)
 (7) MorphMask - Skeletonblack (Men)
 (8) MorphMask - Killer Clown (Men) [#Legal]

 (5) MorphMask - Frankenstein classique (homme)

 (7) MorphMask - Squelette noir (homme)
